channel.title: FLYFF (Fly For Fun)
channel.description:
This is the best MMORPG Ive ever played.
Heres some info -
Link to site - [url=http://flyff.gpotato.com/]http://flyff.gpotato.com/[/url]
About this game - In ancient times, five Gods of Lais sought to create a new world with new inhabitants that could live harmoniously among them. They gathered and agreed to create Roika Mainland; their new world. They created water and the earth, animals and plants as well as Humans. At this time, and at all times in Roika Mainland, it is a time of peace.
After years of peace, the God's decided to leave Roika Mainland and create a new world. With this, in an attempt to maintain the golden age of Roika mainland the Gods of Lais handed all of the secrets of the land as well as the core part of the revolution-genesis gear over to the kind race of Dwarf. The God's only wish was that the world would remain as beautiful and peaceful as it was in their rule.
Simultaneously, to bring happiness to the race of human, the Gods created Comedian-Clown. The Comedian Clown became enraged about bringing happiness to the race of Human and split its personality into three identities; Imagination Ipuli, Shadow Shield and Chromospheres Bobor. Under the initiation of the evil Shadow Shield, the main body-Imagination Ipuli not only chased away the kind Chromospheres Bobor, but also created numerous Human attacking monsters. These monsters took away the revolution-genesis-gear of the race dwarf and developed a new Mainland; a mainland that was angrier, stronger and prepared to destroy the race of Human.
To save the mainland from chaos, the Chromospheres Bobor inherited the mystical ancient-science and black magic of Human. For the restoration of harmonious simple life, the citizens of Roika Mainland were forced to become warriors who would fight against the evil shadow Shield and uphold the wish of the God's.
Out numbered and out matched, the race Human prepares themselves for a battle that may prove to be their end!
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/2512/backgroundstorymainga9.gif[/img][/URL]
Vagrant -
Vagrant is the starting job class you will initially play as when you join the world of FlyFF. It is the starting point of the game, and as a Vagrant you will primarily focus on learning how to play the game.
You will start out with basic equipment, and learn basic fighting skills as you gain experience points through fighting monsters.
You will be able to job change to a more specific and advanced first job class upon reaching level 15. You will be able to fly after you reach level 20, and successfully complete the Flying Quest.
Before then, you do not need to worry about where to distribute your status points as there will be a stat reset after you change your job to the first job class. Generally, you may want to distribute all your points to strength in order to kill monsters more quickly.
The job classes you are able to change into after reaching level 15 are Mercenary, Magician, and Assist. After which you will also learn specific skills selective to the job class you have chosen. Depending on what you prefer, you may want to be up there in the action as a Mercenary, dishing out major damage from the back as a magician, or supporting your friends with healing and buffing spells as an assist.
Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level OverCutter Chr-Lv 4 10 Brendish Chr-Lv6 10 OverCutter Chr-Lv6 10
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/7642/chabigpicvagantbt7.gif[/img][/URL]
Mercenary -
You will be able to job change to a Mercenary from the Vagrant class at level 15.
Mercenary is a job that involves close physical combat. The main characteristics of a Mercenary involve physical strength, and a strong body that is able to withstand attacks.
Useful stats for Mercenary are Str.(Strength) And Sta.(Stamina). Strength will increase your attack power, while stamina will increase your HP.
As a Mercenary you will use close range weapons such as swords and axes to attack your enemies. You will also be able to employ the use of a shield in order to reduce damage to yourself when you are attacked.
When you reach level 60, you will be able to change your job class to either Knight or Blade.
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Splmash Chr-Lv 15 20 Keenwheel Splmash Lv4, Chr-Lv 18 20 Blindside Keenwheel Lv6, Chr-Lv 24 20 Special Hit Blindside Lv8, Chr-Lv 30 20 Bloody Strike Splmash Lv3, Chr-Lv 20 20 Reflex Hit Bloody Strike Lv8, Chr-Lv 25 20 Guilotine Reflex Hit 10, Chr-Lv 30 20 Protection Chr-Lv 30 20 Pan Barrier Protection Lv3, Chr-Lv 30 20 Sneaker Pan Barrier Lv 10, Chr-Lv 20 20 Impower weapon Protection Lv 5, Chr-Lv 20 20 Smite Axe Impower weapon Lv4, Chr-Lv 25 20 Axe mastery Smite Axe Lv9, Chr-Lv 30 20 Blazing sword Impower weapon Lv4, Chr-Lv 25 20 Sword Mastery Blazing sword Lv9, Chr-Lv 30 20
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/7892/chabigpicmercenaryzk9.gif[/img][/URL]
Knight - When you reach level 60 as a Mercenary, you will be able to job change into a Knight.
As a knight you can take on the role of being the tank for the party. You will be at the front taking damage from monsters and dealing damage to monsters.
You will have good defense, enabling you to shield other members from attacks. You will also have the strength to provide consistent damage against monsters.
As a Knight you will wear heavy armor for protection. To fight, you will use swords and axes.
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Chagre Sword Mastery Lv3, Chr-Lv 60 10 Pain Dealer Axe Mastery Lv3, Chr-Lv 60 10 Guard Chr-Lv 60 10 Earth Divider Chagre Lv4, Chr-Lv 65 10 Power Stump Pain Dealer Lv4, Chr-Lv 65 10 Rage Guard Lv 5,Chr-Lv 65 10 Pain Reflection Rage Lv 4, Chr-Lv 70 10 Power Swing Pain Reflection Lv7, Chr-Lv 7 10
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/6729/chabigpicknightot0.gif[/img][/URL]
Blade -
When you reach level 60 as a Mercenary, you will be able to job change into a Blade.
As a Blade, you will hit hard and hit fast. A Blade is the equivalent of being an assassin in that you attack quickly and stealthily, aiming for the kill.
You will have lower defense and HP, but can easily make up for it in your quick attacks and higher dodge rate.
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Silent Strike Sword Mastery Lv3, Chr-Lv 60 10 Spring Attack Axe Mastery Lv3, Chr-Lv 60 10 Armor Penetrate Chr-Lv 62 10 Blade Dance Silent Strike Lv5, Chr-Lv 65 10 Hawk Attack Spring Attack Lv5, Chr-Lv 65 10 Berserk Armor Penetrate Lv4, Chr-Lv 65 10 Sonic Blade Berserk Lv7, Chr-Lv 70 10 Cross Strike Sonic Blade Lv7, Chr-Lv 75 10
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/3993/chabigpicbladegb6.gif[/img][/URL]
Assist
You will be able to job change to an Assist from the Vagrant class at level 15.
The Assist class can go at two ways.
You can either lean towards support, where you help out your party members with buffing spells; or you can lean towards hand to hand combat, focusing on becoming a tank type character.
A useful stat for a support oriented Assist is Int. (Intelligence) as it will increase your MP.
Useful stats for a battle oriented Assist are Str.(Strength) And Sta.(Stamina). Strength will increase your attack power, while stamina will increase your HP.
As an Assist you can either use a magic wand to perform buffing spells, or use your fists to fight enemies. You will also wear light armor.
When you reach level 60, you will be able to change your job class to either Billposter or Ringmaster.
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Heal Chr-Lv15 20 Patience Heal Lv3, Chr-Lv18 20 Resurrection Patience Lv4, Chr-Lv20 20 Circle Healing Resurrection Lv4, Chr-Lv25 20 Prevention Circle Healing Lv4, Chr-Lv30 20 Quick Step Heal Lv3, Chr-Lv18 20 Haste Quick Step Lv3, Chr-Lv25 20 Cat's Reflex Haste Lv4, Chr-Lv28 20 CannonBall Cat's Reflex Lv4, Chr-Lv35 20 MentalSign Heal Lv3, Chr-Lv18 20 HeapUp MentalSign Lv4, Chr-Lv20 20 BeefUp HeapUp Lv4, Chr-Lv25 20 Accuracy BeefUp Lv4, Chr-Lv30 -- Tamping Hole Heal Lv3, Chr-Lv20 20 Stonehand Tamping Hole Lv4, Chr-Lv25 20 Burst Crack Stonehand Lv4, Chr-Lv28 20 Power Fist Burst Crack Lv4, Chr-Lv35 20
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/8642/chabigpicassistee9.gif[/img][/URL]
Billposter
When you reach level 60 as an Assist, you will be able to job change into a Billposter.
As a Billposter, you will be dealing damage through power boosting magic, you are your own strength.
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Belial Smashing Power fist Lv5, Chr-Lv60 10 Asmodeus Chr-Lv60 10 Blood Fist Belial Smashing Lv2, Chr-Lv65 10 Baraqijal Esna Asmodeus Lv3, Chr-Lv65 10 Piercing Serpent Blood Fist Lv5, Chr-Lv70 10 Bgvur Tialbold Baraqijal Esna Lv5, Chr-Lv70 10 Sonichand Piercing Serpent Lv7, Bgvur Tialbold Lv6, Chr-Lv75 10 Asalraalaikum Sonichand Lv7, Chr-Lv80 10
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/4223/chabigpicbillpostervz6.gif[/img][/URL]
Ringmaster
When you reach level 60 as an Assist, you will be able to job change into a Ringmaster.
As a Ringmaster, you will be casting healing and buffing spells. Buffing spells will make you an essential part to any party as you will be able to heal your party members, increase their attack speed, and so forth.
However, the skills may be hard to level. This will pay off in the end as you will probably be one of the most sought after classes for a party.
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Protect Heap up Lv6, Chr-Lv60 10 Holycross Chr-Lv60 10 Gvur Tialla Prevention Lv4, Chr-Lv60 10 Holyguard Protect Lv3, Chr-Lv65 10 Spiriture Fortune Chr-Lv65 10 Heal Rain Gvur Tialla Lv3, Chr-Lv70 10 Geburah Tiphreth Holyguard Lv4, Spiriture Fortune Lv7, Chr-Lv75 10 Merkaba Hanzelrusha Heal Rain Lv4, Chr-Lv80 10
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img186.imageshack.us/img186/6642/chabigpicringmasterqr7.gif[/img][/URL]
Magician
You will be able to job change to a Magician from the Vagrant class at level 15.
Magician is a job class that involves dealing magical damage from a distance by casting spells. You will learn spells as skills, and be able to use them to deal massive damage to monsters.
You can deal even more damage by following the elemental chart. [insert link with chart on which element is weak/strong against which]
You will have lower defense, lower HP, and a delay time in casting spells, but you are able to cast massively damaging spells if you do it right.
As a Magician you will use staves and wands to cast magic spells. You will also be wearing light armor.
A useful stat for Magician is Int. (Intelligence), which will increase your magic attack power, and maximum MP.
When you reach level 60, you will be able to change your job class to either Psykeeper or Elementer.
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Mental strike Chr-Lv 15 20 Fire Boomerang Mental strile Lv 3, Chr-Lv18 20 Hot Air Fire Boomerang Lv 25, Chr-Lv25 20 Fire strike Hot Air Lv7, Chr-Lv 30 20 Sword wind Mental strike Lv5, Chr-Lv 20 20 Strong wind Sword wind Lv5, Chr-Lv 25 20 Guilotine Reflex Hit 10, Chr-Lv 30 20 Protection Protection Lv3, Chr-Lv 30 20 Pan Barrier Pan Barrier Lv 10, Chr-Lv 20 20 Impower weapon Protection Lv 5, Chr-Lv 20 20 Smite Axe Impower weapon Lv4, Chr-Lv 25 20 Axe mastery Smite Axe Lv9, Chr-Lv 30 20 Blazing sword Impower weapon Lv4, Chr-Lv 25 20 Sword Mastery Blazing sword Lv9, Chr-Lv 30 20 Splmash Chr-Lv6 20 OverCutter Chr-Lv6 20
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img512.imageshack.us/img512/2886/chabigpicmagicianqv7.gif[/img][/URL]
Psykeeper
When you reach level 60 as a Magician, you will be able to job change into a Psykeeper.
As a Psykeeper, you can weaken the enemy by casting debuffing spells. Debuffing spells are weakening spells. Basically, Psykeeper is a support class, and is an asset to any party.
You will be a valuable member of any party due to the fact that your debuffing spells will enable the party to defeat the monster more easily.
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Demonolgy Chr-Lv 60 10 Psychic Bomb Mental Strike Lv10, Chr-Lv 60 10 Crucio Spell Mental Strike Lv10, Chr-Lv 60 10 Satanolgy Demonolgy Lv3, Chr-Lv 65 10 Sprit Bomb Psychic Bomb Lv6, Chr-Lv 65 10 Maximum Crisis Crucio Spell Lv7, Chr-Lv 65 10 Psychic Wall Satanolgy Lv4, Sprit Bomb Lv5, Chr-Lv 70 10 Psychic Square Psychic Wall Lv7, Maximum Crisis Lv5, Chr-Lv 75 10
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img512.imageshack.us/img512/2024/chabigpicpsykeepermy8.gif[/img][/URL]
Elementer
When you reach level 60 as a Magician, you will be able to job change into an Elementer.
As an Elementer, you will probably be dealing out the most damage out of all the second job classes. However, you will have lower HP, and will most likely not be able to dodge many attacks.
You will be a valuable member of any party due to the sheer amount of damage you can do, taking out chunks of monsters’ HP.
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Firebird Fire Strike Lv7, Chr-Lv60 10 Stone Spear Looting Lv3, Chr-Lv60 10 Void Windcutter Lv7, Chr-Lv60 10 Thunder Strike Lightening Shock Lv7, Chr-Lv60 10 Iceshark Spring water Lv7, Chr-Lv60 10 Burningfield Fire Bird Lv5, Chr-Lv65 10 Earthquake Stone Spear Lv4, Chr-Lv65 10 Windfield Void Lv5, Chr-Lv65 10 Eletric Shock Thunder Strike Lv4, Chr-Lv65 10 Poison Cloud Iceshark Lv5, Chr-Lv65 10 Fire Master Fire Strike Lv7, Chr-Lv70 10 Earth Master Looting Lv3, Chr-Lv70 10 Wind Master Wind Cutter Lv7, Chr-Lv70 10 Lighting Master Lightening Shock Lv7, Chr-Lv70 10 Water Master Spring water Lv7, Chr-Lv70 10 Meteo Shower Burningfield LV6, Earthquake Lv5, Chr-Lv70 10 Sandstorm Windfield Lv6, Earthquake Lv5, Chr-Lv70 10 Lightingstorm Windfield Lv6, Eletric Shock Lv5, Chr-Lv70 10 Avalanche Poison Cloud Lv7, earthquakeLv7, Chr-Lv75 10
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img503.imageshack.us/img503/8283/chabigpicelementerle1.gif[/img][/URL]
Acrobat
You will be able to job change to an Acrobat from the Vagrant class at level 15.
The Acrobat class can go at two ways.
Acrobat, who uses mainly long distance attack, is a kind of many who always smile and act gentle. He believe with his speed and accuracy, he can break anybody who want to fight him.
Apparently, he looks very kind and nice person; however, due to the fact that his nature is assassin, he thinks every body can be enemy.
When you reach level 60, you will be able to change your job class to either Jester or Ran
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Pulling Chr-Lv15 20 Fast Walker Pulling Lv4, Chr-Lv18 20 Dark Illusion Fast Walker Lv5, Chr-Lv30 20 Perfect Block Dark Illusion Lv8, Chr-Lv45 20 Slow Step Chr-Lv15 20 YoYo Mastery Slow Step Lv3, Chr-Lv20 20 Cross Line YoYo Mastery Lv3, Chr-Lv30 20 Snitch YoYo Mastery 8, Chr-Lv35 20 Counter Attack Cross Line Lv10, Chr-Lv40 20 Deadly Swing Snitch Lv3, Chr-Lv50 20 Junk Arrow Chr-Lv15 20 Perfect Block Dark Illusion Lv8, Chr-Lv45 20 Bow Mastery Junk Arrow Lv5, Chr-Lv20 20 Silent Shot Bow Mastery Lv4, Chr-Lv30 20 Aimed Shot Bow Mastery Lv5, Chr-Lv35 20 Auto Shot Silent Shot Lv9, Chr-Lv45 20 Arrow Rain Aim Shot Lv5 Chr-Lv50 20
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img111.imageshack.us/img111/2100/chabigpicacrobatxu7.gif[/img][/URL]
Jester
When you reach level 60 as a Acrobat, you will be able to job change into a Jester.
Jester, who has less defense power than attack power, is a derived from acrobat who uses yo-yo as a main weapon. He has a lot of useful skills who make jester more stronger like snatch and hiding.
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Enchant Poison Deadly Swing Lv4, Chr-Lv 60 10 Enchant Blood Chr-Lv 60 10 Escape Perfect Block Lv6, Chr-Lv 60 10 Critical Swing Enchant Poison Lv3, Chr-Lv 65 10 Back Step Enchant Blood Lv3, Chr-Lv 70 10 Enchant Absorb Escape Lv3, Chr-Lv 70 10 Vatal Stab Critical Swing Lv4, Backstep Lv7, Chr-Lv 80 10 Hit of Penya Enchant Absorb Lv4, Chr-Lv 75 10
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img111.imageshack.us/img111/3279/chabigpicjesterow1.gif[/img][/URL]
Ranger
When you reach level 60 as a Acrobat, you will be able to job change into a Ranger.
Ranger is a derived from acrobat who uses bow as a main weapon
Skills Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level Ice Arrow Auto Shot Lv4, Chr-Lv 60 10 Flame Arrow Chr-Lv 60 10 Poison Arrow Arrow Rain Lv3, Chr-Lv 60 10 Fast Shot Ice Arrow Lv3, Chr-Lv 65 10 Piercing Arrow Flame Arrow Lv3, Chr-Lv 70 10 Nature Poison Arrow Lv4, Chr-Lv 70 10 Triple Shot Fast Shot Lv4, Piercing Lv7, Chr-Lv 80 10 Silent Shot Nature Lv4, Chr-Lv 75 10
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img399.imageshack.us/img399/7200/chabigpicrangerbq2.gif[/img][/URL]
Thats about it =)

item.title: FLYFF (Fly For Fun)
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

This is the best MMORPG Ive ever played.

Heres some info -

Link to site - http://flyff.gpotato.com/

About this game - In ancient times, five Gods of Lais sought to create a new world with new inhabitants that could live harmoniously among them. They gathered and agreed to create Roika Mainland; their new world. They created water and the earth, animals and plants as well as Humans. At this time, and at all times in Roika Mainland, it is a time of peace.

After years of peace, the God’s decided to leave Roika Mainland and create a new world. With this, in an attempt to maintain the golden age of Roika mainland the Gods of Lais handed all of the secrets of the land as well as the core part of the revolution-genesis gear over to the kind race of Dwarf. The God’s only wish was that the world would remain as beautiful and peaceful as it was in their rule.

Simultaneously, to bring happiness to the race of human, the Gods created Comedian-Clown. The Comedian Clown became enraged about bringing happiness to the race of Human and split its personality into three identities; Imagination Ipuli, Shadow Shield and Chromospheres Bobor. Under the initiation of the evil Shadow Shield, the main body-Imagination Ipuli not only chased away the kind Chromospheres Bobor, but also created numerous Human attacking monsters. These monsters took away the revolution-genesis-gear of the race dwarf and developed a new Mainland; a mainland that was angrier, stronger and prepared to destroy the race of Human.

To save the mainland from chaos, the Chromospheres Bobor inherited the mystical ancient-science and black magic of Human. For the restoration of harmonious simple life, the citizens of Roika Mainland were forced to become warriors who would fight against the evil shadow Shield and uphold the wish of the God’s.

Out numbered and out matched, the race Human prepares themselves for a battle that may prove to be their end!

Vagrant -

Vagrant is the starting job class you will initially play as when you join the world of FlyFF. It is the starting point of the game, and as a Vagrant you will primarily focus on learning how to play the game.

You will start out with basic equipment, and learn basic fighting skills as you gain experience points through fighting monsters.

You will be able to job change to a more specific and advanced first job class upon reaching level 15. You will be able to fly after you reach level 20, and successfully complete the Flying Quest.

Before then, you do not need to worry about where to distribute your status points as there will be a stat reset after you change your job to the first job class. Generally, you may want to distribute all your points to strength in order to kill monsters more quickly.

The job classes you are able to change into after reaching level 15 are Mercenary, Magician, and Assist. After which you will also learn specific skills selective to the job class you have chosen. Depending on what you prefer, you may want to be up there in the action as a Mercenary, dishing out major damage from the back as a magician, or supporting your friends with healing and buffing spells as an assist.

Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level
OverCutter Chr-Lv 4 10
Brendish Chr-Lv6 10
OverCutter Chr-Lv6 10

Mercenary -

You will be able to job change to a Mercenary from the Vagrant class at level 15.

Mercenary is a job that involves close physical combat. The main characteristics of a Mercenary involve physical strength, and a strong body that is able to withstand attacks.

Useful stats for Mercenary are Str.(Strength) And Sta.(Stamina). Strength will increase your attack power, while stamina will increase your HP.

As a Mercenary you will use close range weapons such as swords and axes to attack your enemies. You will also be able to employ the use of a shield in order to reduce damage to yourself when you are attacked.

When you reach level 60, you will be able to change your job class to either Knight or Blade.

Skills
Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level
Splmash Chr-Lv 15 20
Keenwheel Splmash Lv4, Chr-Lv 18 20
Blindside Keenwheel Lv6, Chr-Lv 24 20
Special Hit Blindside Lv8, Chr-Lv 30 20
Bloody Strike Splmash Lv3, Chr-Lv 20 20
Reflex Hit Bloody Strike Lv8, Chr-Lv 25 20
Guilotine Reflex Hit 10, Chr-Lv 30 20
Protection Chr-Lv 30 20
Pan Barrier Protection Lv3, Chr-Lv 30 20
Sneaker Pan Barrier Lv 10, Chr-Lv 20 20
Impower weapon Protection Lv 5, Chr-Lv 20 20
Smite Axe Impower weapon Lv4, Chr-Lv 25 20
Axe mastery Smite Axe Lv9, Chr-Lv 30 20
Blazing sword Impower weapon Lv4, Chr-Lv 25 20
Sword Mastery Blazing sword Lv9, Chr-Lv 30 20

Knight - When you reach level 60 as a Mercenary, you will be able to job change into a Knight.

As a knight you can take on the role of being the tank for the party. You will be at the front taking damage from monsters and dealing damage to monsters.

You will have good defense, enabling you to shield other members from attacks. You will also have the strength to provide consistent damage against monsters.

As a Knight you will wear heavy armor for protection. To fight, you will use swords and axes.

Skills
Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level
Chagre Sword Mastery Lv3, Chr-Lv 60 10
Pain Dealer Axe Mastery Lv3, Chr-Lv 60 10
Guard Chr-Lv 60 10
Earth Divider Chagre Lv4, Chr-Lv 65 10
Power Stump Pain Dealer Lv4, Chr-Lv 65 10
Rage Guard Lv 5,Chr-Lv 65 10
Pain Reflection Rage Lv 4, Chr-Lv 70 10
Power Swing Pain Reflection Lv7, Chr-Lv 7 10

Blade -

When you reach level 60 as a Mercenary, you will be able to job change into a Blade.

As a Blade, you will hit hard and hit fast. A Blade is the equivalent of being an assassin in that you attack quickly and stealthily, aiming for the kill.

You will have lower defense and HP, but can easily make up for it in your quick attacks and higher dodge rate.

Skills
Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level
Silent Strike Sword Mastery Lv3, Chr-Lv 60 10
Spring Attack Axe Mastery Lv3, Chr-Lv 60 10
Armor Penetrate Chr-Lv 62 10
Blade Dance Silent Strike Lv5, Chr-Lv 65 10
Hawk Attack Spring Attack Lv5, Chr-Lv 65 10
Berserk Armor Penetrate Lv4, Chr-Lv 65 10
Sonic Blade Berserk Lv7, Chr-Lv 70 10
Cross Strike Sonic Blade Lv7, Chr-Lv 75 10

Assist

You will be able to job change to an Assist from the Vagrant class at level 15.

The Assist class can go at two ways.

You can either lean towards support, where you help out your party members with buffing spells; or you can lean towards hand to hand combat, focusing on becoming a tank type character.

A useful stat for a support oriented Assist is Int. (Intelligence) as it will increase your MP.

Useful stats for a battle oriented Assist are Str.(Strength) And Sta.(Stamina). Strength will increase your attack power, while stamina will increase your HP.

As an Assist you can either use a magic wand to perform buffing spells, or use your fists to fight enemies. You will also wear light armor.

When you reach level 60, you will be able to change your job class to either Billposter or Ringmaster.

Skills
Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level
Heal Chr-Lv15 20
Patience Heal Lv3, Chr-Lv18 20
Resurrection Patience Lv4, Chr-Lv20 20
Circle Healing Resurrection Lv4, Chr-Lv25 20
Prevention Circle Healing Lv4, Chr-Lv30 20
Quick Step Heal Lv3, Chr-Lv18 20
Haste Quick Step Lv3, Chr-Lv25 20
Cat’s Reflex Haste Lv4, Chr-Lv28 20
CannonBall Cat’s Reflex Lv4, Chr-Lv35 20
MentalSign Heal Lv3, Chr-Lv18 20
HeapUp MentalSign Lv4, Chr-Lv20 20
BeefUp HeapUp Lv4, Chr-Lv25 20
Accuracy BeefUp Lv4, Chr-Lv30 –
Tamping Hole Heal Lv3, Chr-Lv20 20
Stonehand Tamping Hole Lv4, Chr-Lv25 20
Burst Crack Stonehand Lv4, Chr-Lv28 20
Power Fist Burst Crack Lv4, Chr-Lv35 20

Billposter

When you reach level 60 as an Assist, you will be able to job change into a Billposter.

As a Billposter, you will be dealing damage through power boosting magic, you are your own strength.

Skills
Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level
Belial Smashing Power fist Lv5, Chr-Lv60 10

Ringmaster

When you reach level 60 as an Assist, you will be able to job change into a Ringmaster.

As a Ringmaster, you will be casting healing and buffing spells. Buffing spells will make you an essential part to any party as you will be able to heal your party members, increase their attack speed, and so forth.

However, the skills may be hard to level. This will pay off in the end as you will probably be one of the most sought after classes for a party.

Skills
Icon Skill Requirement Mater Level

Holycross Chr-Lv60 10

Holyguard Protect Lv3, Chr-Lv65 10

Geburah Tiphreth Holyguard Lv4, Spiriture Fortune Lv7, Chr-Lv75 10
Merkaba Hanzelrusha Heal Rain Lv4, Chr-Lv80 10

Magician

You will be able to job change to a Magician from the Vagrant class at level 15.

Magician is a job class that involves dealing magical damage from a distance by casting spells. You will learn spells as skills, and be able to use them to deal massive damage to monsters.

You can deal even more damage by following the elemental chart. [insert link with chart on which element is weak/strong against which]

You will have lower defense, lower HP, and a delay time in casting spells, but you are able to cast massively damaging spells if you do it right.

As a Magician you will use staves and wands to cast magic spells. You will also be wearing light armor.

A useful stat for Magician is Int. (Intelligence), which will increase your magic attack power, and maximum MP.

When you reach level 60, you will be able to change your job class to either Psykeeper or Elementer.

Psykeeper

When you reach level 60 as a Magician, you will be able to job change into a Psykeeper.

As a Psykeeper, you can weaken the enemy by casting debuffing spells. Debuffing spells are weakening spells. Basically, Psykeeper is a support class, and is an asset to any party.

You will be a valuable member of any party due to the fact that your debuffing spells will enable the party to defeat the monster more easily.

Elementer

When you reach level 60 as a Magician, you will be able to job change into an Elementer.

As an Elementer, you will probably be dealing out the most damage out of all the second job classes. However, you will have lower HP, and will most likely not be able to dodge many attacks.

You will be a valuable member of any party due to the sheer amount of damage you can do, taking out chunks of monsters’ HP.

Acrobat

You will be able to job change to an Acrobat from the Vagrant class at level 15.

The Acrobat class can go at two ways.

Acrobat, who uses mainly long distance attack, is a kind of many who always smile and act gentle. He believe with his speed and accuracy, he can break anybody who want to fight him.

Apparently, he looks very kind and nice person; however, due to the fact that his nature is assassin, he thinks every body can be enemy.

When you reach level 60, you will be able to change your job class to either Jester or Ran

Jester

When you reach level 60 as a Acrobat, you will be able to job change into a Jester.

Jester, who has less defense power than attack power, is a derived from acrobat who uses yo-yo as a main weapon. He has a lot of useful skills who make jester more stronger like snatch and hiding.

Ranger is a derived from acrobat who uses bow as a main weapon
